s8.message: Fixed: Shortcut keys Shift-V and Shift-E might get selected if the browser is misconfigured (forum topic).

s3.message: Issue reporter: Report will include information about whether JavaScript and cookies are enabled (forum topic).

s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to {1}.

s7.message: Fixed: Firefox Sync support isn't working.

s6.message: Fixed: Filter subscriptions are no longer being updated automatically (forum topic).

s5.message: Fixed: Adblock Plus might break extensions like IE Tab using NPAPI plugins (forum topic, bug 769708).

s4.message: Filter preferences: improved display in right-to-left locales (forum topic).
